page.title: 05BROTHER ADAM
page.content: He has{blue}eyes that are very good considering he is 88.He didn't walk slowly as you might think and he walked uprightly which made him seem very tall.His nose was sort of hooked. He had dark skin with no spots(that I noticed anyway).His skin was wrinkled but they were soft wrinkles.When we went we discovered that there was a lot more to bee-keeping than we realised. The {Buckfast Bee}is a special breed notified as a species.They breed the queens at hexworthy. They are exported all over the world and especially to Scandinavia and the USA. The workers are all females.In the summer they live for about five weeks.They live longer in the winter because there isn't so much work to do.The drones die when they mate because some vital tissues are ripped out.
